article:
When my brother and I were kids, we sometimes fought. One day I jumped over the gate to go downstairs when my brother was washing clothes. _ my brother was in the way, I hit him by mistake. Then he _ me back on the head. I had been _ angry because my dad did not allow me to go to movies in the morning. So I _ with him. And then we fought until _ dad stopped us. I then found _ on my hand. My brother's nose was bleeding badly. About an hour later I cooled off, I realized that I was _ . He was my brother. I should get on with him. I said _ to him and we became as close as we were before.
Today is his birthday. We talked _ that on  the birthday party. Happy birthday, my dear.
